settings.heading: Here, you can rest assured.
settings.slide-des: Beyond peaceful sleep, we’re committed to your peace of mind.
settings.slide-des-mb: Beyond peaceful sleep, we’re committed to your peace of mind.

settings.sub_title:
Since 1997, we’ve believed:
Refreshing sleep makes people better versions of themselves. So:
settings.heading: Finding the perfect pieces to get the rest you need should be easy.
settings.text: We’ve been dedicated craftsmen for generations. 27 years ago, we launched a new line of down products in New York – and  Comfydown was born.

settings.heading:
Crafted for comfort,  
Built on trust.
settings.text: Our family business quickly became a trusted address for everything quality down and feathers. We prize that trust, and work every day to actualize it. By living up to our promises. By producing immaculately perfect products. By sourcing the most deliciously comfortable materials. And by treating our customers to transparent, reliable, dedicated service – guaranteed.

settings.block_text: Moisture-wicking properties woven into our materials keep you dry and fresh all night.
Our engineering expertise enhances the natural powers down possesses to follow your body’s lead and keep your temperature perfect.
No product is allowed outside our studio without meticulous testing to ensure it’s as perfect as we’ve promised you.

settings.section_title: At the ComfyDown studio, innovative technology  clasps hands with age-old craft secrets.
settings.section_description: Each piece we create is precision-engineered to comfort, pamper and refresh.

settings.custom_liquid:

products

settings.title: Softness designed with innovative technology and decades-old craft secrets.
settings.content:
Every ComfyDown product is born with the spark of an idea. Our artisans sit down to design and engineer every detail. They create a sample and test it for quality and comfort.

Our team handcrafts each piece with high-quality materials, ensuring consistent excellence. Each product is carefully inspected, cleaned, and packed — and then shipped to you.

settings.heading: Searching for better sleep?
settings.text: A ComfyDown pillow might be the dream you’ve been waiting for. We offer multiple firmness levels, a variety of fills, a find-your-perfect-pillow quiz, and the best customer service in the industry.

settings.description: From down and fabrics to construction and craftsmanship, we never settle for less than the best.
More than anything else, honesty and transparency define how we craft our products and support our customers.

settings.description: We treat every feathered friend with care. Every team member with respect. Every customer with 100% dedication.
We’re here to help customers fall in love with their bedding and wake up feeling delicious every day.
Conscious of our impact, we work to make a difference through high sustainability standards.

settings.heading: So many reasons to love ComfyDown
Not sure which product will pave your way to Dreamland?
settings.text: Get guidance in a supportive chat with one of our comfort experts.
